name: Norio Akuhara
description: Norio, also nicknamed Akki, for single-handedly disposing of a large number ofTyger Claws, started out as an experienced fighter following the ideology of Sota. His meditative approach to fighting had made him a formidable, unpredictable opponent, so it was not difficult for him to join a gang once he wished to do so. He examined and evaluated his bosses in fights, letting them deal with enemies alone to prove themselves and validate his decision to work for them.
